price: 3. Ama koros kinni addunyâ mano akeerâ manok doorittaah muxxussam, usun sinam Yallih gitih (islaam diinih gita kinnuk) katayyuk waasaanaah ken nafsi elle faxa innal ama giti makot yan gita yakkem kaak faxan, too maray tama weeloolat weeloysime cakki gitak makot yaniih, tirtol ken xayyossu haytaamak xeeroonuh.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡتَحِبُّونَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا عَلَى ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَيَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَبۡغُونَهَا عِوَجًاۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ فِي ضَلَٰلِۭ بَعِيدٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yastaḥibbūna al-ḥayata al-dun'yā ʿalā al-ākhirati wayaṣuddūna ʿan sabīli al-lahi wayabghūnahā ʿiwajan ulāika fī ḍalālin baʿīdin
